mapper.insert: insert into tblCrt(crtSeq, crtName, crtTypeSeq, expiration, agencySeq, isRoutine, difficulty, qualificationCate, qualification, crtInfo, jobDesc) values (crtSeq.nextVal, #{crtName}, #{crtTypeSeq}, #{expiration}, #{agencySeq}, #{isRoutine}, #{difficulty}, #{qualificationCate}, #{qualification}, #{crtInfo}, #{jobDesc})
